<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>Get Extensions Configuration from NB (v2.0)</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/sdwan/v2.0/api/ws/extensions/{extension_id}"}></MethodEndpoint>



Get a specific extension configuration from the NB.

## Request

Successful Operation

</div><div><MimeTabs className={"openapi-tabs__mime"} schemaType={"response"}><TabItem label={"application/json"} value={"application/json"}><SchemaTabs className={"openapi-tabs__schema"}><TabItem label={"Schema"} value={"Schema"}><details style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details response"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}} className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-response"}><strong>Schema</strong></summary><div style={{"textAlign":"left","marginLeft":"1rem"}}></div><ul style={{"marginLeft":"1rem"}}><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"conf"} required={true} schemaName={"object"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"object"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"disabled"} required={false} schemaName={"boolean"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"List the disabled extensions.\n","type":"boolean"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"entity_id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The entity ID. Only numbers are allowed (0-9).\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The ID.\n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The name of the extension. Max size = 128. \n","type":"string"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"namespace"} required={true} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"description":"The extension namespace.
